metadata.name: /// HEARTGAN ///
metadata.description:
Original 3D sculpture created entirely from fragments of reality using 3D scanning.

 Technology has become an integral part of our lives.
 This 3D sculpture captures the complexity of the relationship between technology and the human body, representing how intertwined and dependent on each other they are. This unique NFT expresses the beauty and intricacy of this relationship, and serves as a reminder of the importance of this bond.
